title: How AI Is Transforming Digital Marketing and Why Businesses Are Turning to AI SEO Services
description: New Delhi [India], January 20: Artificial intelligence is redefining the digital marketing landscape at an unprecedented pace. What was once driven by manual research, static keywords, and delayed reporting is now powered by intelligent systems capable of real-time analysis, prediction, and optimization. This leaves businesses looking to compete with no choice but to use AI as a core driver of visibility, engagement, and growth-no longer an experimental add-on.

title: Nitin Nabin My Boss in Party Matters: PM Modi

title: Davos: ReNew to expand in 'measured, smart way' without being greedy, says Co chief Sumant Sinha
description: ReNew chief Sumant Sinha said the clean energy major will expand cautiously in Indias renewable energy market, focusing on a phased and “measured” approach rather than rushing to capture the entire value chain. He said artificial intelligence and data centres are emerging as major drivers of power demand, with renewables likely to supply more than 80% of this requirement in the future.

title: ‘Gen Z is the most concerned generation’: Workers expect AI to reshape jobs, Randstad Survey finds
description: Majority of the workers believe that artificial intelligence will impact their lives and take over their jobs causing unemployment with Gen Z being the most concerned as companies rely on AI chatbots and automation to carry out different tasks, according to a survey conducted by Randstad.

title: Man arrested for posting AI-generated sexual images of female celebrities online
description: Police in Tokyo have arrested a 31-year-old unemployed man on suspicion of using generative artificial intelligence (AI) to create deepfake sexual images of female celebrities and posting them online where he sold them. According to police, Tatsuro Chiba, who lives in Sapporo, is suspected of posting over 14 deepfake images…
